channel.title: Case?

item.title: Case?
item.dc:creator: @nolzan nolzan
item.description:
@nolzan wrote:

Hello guys i just have a quick question i am using “yourserver v3” as my server and client and i am trying to make an npc talk not over their head but like in the chat area and i always see

case 301: // Spells of the gods (q3) start point sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902); sendFrame126("", 4903); sendFrame126("Hi there, you don't happen to of seen a staff", 4904); sendFrame126("with a pink orb, have you?", 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; And i was wondering what case goes to which npcs? Or did something wrong happen? Note: The code above was from dragzscape

Read full topic
